walawwata pita gamiyo walawwata baya pakshapathawa henak kumbaurak kotagena parampara ganak thisse jiwath wuna.walawkarayo eliyata yaddi me aya dekata nawuna.garu saru athiwa "dadli hamu" kiwwa."mathiniya" kiyala lensuwa karata gaththa.walawkarayo sapata inna eka gamiyanta prashnayak wune naha."eeka ee ayage wasanawa" kiyala sadbhawayenma hithagaththa.walawwata set wuna kawuru hari ayuthu widihata hari hambu karanawa dakkoth "oya thathweta aawama kawuda ohoma nokaranne" kiyala hithagaththa.walawwe mahathwaru idala hitala gamiyanta thagi dunna.thaman kala ithiri wuna deyak thiyanawa nam gammunta katha karala kannath,bila ithiri wuna deyak thiyenawa nam bonnath dunna.me ahaka dana pinbath walata nidahas adhyapanaya,nidahas saukhyaya wage gambhira nam set ekakuth damma.

piriwen adhyapana kalaye dima 1980 juni masa 25 wana dina malwathu maha wiharaye di adhishila shikshasankhyatha upasampadawa labagath wimalarathana himipano thaman prawrujyawata path wu kirigal wawa shri bodhi rajarama wiharasthanayata wadamawa ehi bhauthika sampath wadi diyunu kirimata kriya kala pamanak nowa game tharuna daru dariyan wishwawidyala prawesha wibhagayen samath karawima sandaha kirigalwawa maha widyalaye swechcha guruwarayaku washayen wasara dekak sewaya kalaha.
